kpi.name: M1022C142

kpi_info.title: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO AC FOR BACKGROUND
kpi_info.use: The number of DCH reconfiguration failures for background NRT RB due to Admission Control in SRNC in DL. UPDATED: When the DCH reconfiguration for background NRT RB in the downlink direction fails due to admission control.

kpi.kpi_alias: DCH DOWNLINK RECONFIG FAIL DUE TO AC FOR BACKGROUND
